original_title: Long Drawn-Out Trip: Sketches from Los Angeles
overview: A cartoon film drawn, devised and directed by GERALD SCARFE : a series of sketches recording Scarfe's personal impressions of Los Angeles on a six-week visit, and featuring many of the best-known American folk heroes, from history, from Hollywood, and from contemporary life.  http://genome.ch.bbc.co.uk/schedules/bbctwo/england/1973-10-06#at-20.15
title: Long Drawn-Out Trip: Sketches from Los Angeles
